title: Ian Blackford – 2022 Comments on Austerity in Scotland
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Ian Blackford, the Leader of the SNP in Westminster, on Twitter on 1 November 2022.
content: Rishi Sunak has no mandate to impose devastating Tory austerity cuts – or, indeed, any mandate at all.
With the Tories and Labour Party imposing Brexit and cuts, independence is the only way to keep Scotland safe and get back on the path to prosperity.
